title: Ticket #5773: Proxy delegation bug in gridsite, used by cream
description:
The gridsite library has a bug in how it delegates RFC proxies, which is fixed in version 2.2.6. This library is used by the cream_gahp. We should update to the newer version.

While we're at it, we can update canl-c, which gridsite depends on.
check_ins:
2016-Jul-27 15:36   Check-in [48858]: Docs for cream_gahp proxy delegation bug fix. #5773 (By Jaime Frey )
2016-Jul-06 10:16   Check-in [48741]: Update gridsite library used in cream_gahp. #5773 The older gridside library has a bug when delegating RFC proxies, such that the credential chain will have mixed proxy formats. Also update canl-c, which gridsite depends on. (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
